ImportExportHeading.description: The heading displayed above the import/export controls on the management panel.

ImportHeading.message: Import Filters from an Export File
ImportHeading.description: The heading displayed above the import section on the management panel.

ImportHelpText.message: Use this to import a previously exported filter file.
ImportHelpText.description: The help text displayed above the import section on the management panel.

ImportInstructions.message:
Drag & drop a DeviantArt Filter file here
(or click anywhere in this box to select a file)
ImportInstructions.description: The text displayed on the import drag-and-drop target box.

ImportResultsHeading.description: The heading displayed above the import results on the management panel.

ImportingFilters.description: The message displayed while filters are being imported on the management panel.

ImportFiltersError.message: An error occurred while importing filter data: $ERROR$
ImportFiltersError.description: The error message displayed if an error occurs while importing filter data.

ExportHeading.description: The heading displayed above the export section on the management panel.

ExportHelpText.message: Use this to export all of your current filters to a file (for backup or migration purposes)
ExportHelpText.description: The help text displayed above the export section on the management panel.

ExportButtonLabel.description: The text for the button to export filters to a file.

ExportGeneratingFile.description: The text displayed while the export file is being generated.

ExportFiltersError.message: An error occurred while exporting filter data: $ERROR$
ExportFiltersError.description: The error message displayed if an error occurs while exporting filter data.
